name: NinJump
summary: Climb ninja, climb! In this fast-paced ninja running game, your goal is to climb as high as you can while avoiding evil squirrels, dive-bombing birds, enemy ninjas, throwing stars, exploding bombs & more! Effortlessly scale the side of buildings with ninja agility. Tap to jump from one wall to the other, slashing enemies in your way. Hit three matching enemies in a row for a bonus power-up boost. Grab shields for protection. Watch out for obstacles & ledges. Stay alive!
